title: createMqQueue
description: schema defining valid JSON for creating a mqQueue

application.description: the name of the application the db is for (must be valid fasit application)

environmentName.description: the name of the environment the db will be used (must be valid fasit environment)

environmentClass.description: the environment class of the environment

queueManager.description: the name of the quemanager to create this channel on (must be valid fasit resource)

fasitAlias.description: alias in fasit for the channel

maxMessageSize.description: How big the messages in this queue can be in Mb.

queueDepth.description: How many messages can be on this queue
